name: NSOrderedCollectionDifferenceCalculationOptions
desc: Constants that specify the options to use when creating an ordered collection difference.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a set of difference calculation options.

items.name: static var inferMoves: NSOrderedCollectionDifferenceCalculationOptions
items.desc: An option that identifies insertions or removals as moves.

items.name: static var omitInsertedObjects: NSOrderedCollectionDifferenceCalculationOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates that the difference should omit references to the insertions.

items.name: static var omitRemovedObjects: NSOrderedCollectionDifferenceCalculationOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates that the difference should omit references to the removals.
